lines.text: Prince Achmed was young and brave and not afraid of any adventure.
Far, far from home, he finally lands on the one of the magic islands of Wak-Wak.
We serve Pari Banu, ruler of the islands of the spirits of Wak-Wak. Stay with us, attractive stranger!
On the neighboring island in the Magic Sea... the beautiful Pari Banu and her female companions come to bathe every night.
Follow me to my beautiful home country.
Don't be afraid of me... I shall serve you to my death.
You don't know the demons of Wak-Wak! They will kill you!
Allah's grace will protect us if you become my wife.
We will find our way home and you will forget Wak-Wak.
